plot: Polynomial Bounds On Parallel Repetition For All 3-Player Games With Binary Inputs
summary: They prove that for every 3-player (3-prover) game with value less than one, whose query distribution has the support of hamming weight one vectors, the value of the $n$-fold parallel repetition of the game decays polynomially fast to zero. The value of a game such as $c = c (c)>0$ is at most $n^{-c$ and $n = c(\mathcal G) >0$.
